OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a Public Authority
DevelopmentDescription: "CONVERSION OF RIVERSVALE HOUSE INTO 6 APARTMENTS TOGETHER WITH ERECTION OF 6 TOWNHOUSES IN GROUNDS TO INCLUDE DEMOLITION OF RIVERSVALE CENTRE & ASSOCIATED HIGHWAY WORKS (AMENDED PLANS & DESCRIPTION)"
Notes:
"63863:  CONVERSION OF RIVERSVALE HOUSE INTO 6 APARTMENTS TOGETHER WITH ERECTION OF 6 TOWNHOUSES IN GROUNDS TO INCLUDE DEMOLITION OF RIVERSVALE CENTRE & ASSOCIATED HIGHWAY WORKS (AMENDED PLANS & DESCRIPTION). Pending Decision

The site is within an extreme risk of flooding although a solution has been found in consultation with the EA that can deliver a viable development whilst avoiding flood risk and providing a means of escape. Current scheme (13 units) within application 63863 is considered too intensive and a development of around 10 or 11 units is likely to be more acceptable that will also have less impact on the listed building and conservation area."
